special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Glasspool enters, return up to two target creatures to their owner’s hands.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
At the beginning of your end step, you may return a nontoken creature you control to its owner’s hand. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it.
 Level 3
